topic.title: Introductions
topic.text:
Instructor Introduction

I hope you enjoy the course and your introduction to the Earth Sciences at Dominican University. Here is a little about me:

I have been teaching classes at Dominican in Earth Science, Environmental Science, Legal Reasoning, Politics, and Law. While at Dominican, I have designed courses in Earth Science, Environmental Science, and Environmental Law, as well as Environmental Politics and Legal Reasoning. I hold a JD from Thomas M. Cooley Law School, a MS in Environmental Science and Policy from University of Wisconsin - Green Bay, and a BS in Environmental Science from Saint Norbert College.

I'd like to get to know all of you as well so that I can begin to learn more about how I can serve your goals and interests.

Discussion Instructions

Please introduce yourself. Tell us something about your biographyâ€”details about your life that you would like to share.

Please tell us something about what you hope to take away from this course.

  • To introduce yourself, click "Reply" below.
  • You may write a response or...
  • If you wish to post a video in the discussion, watch the brief tutorial below.

How to submit a Video in a Canvas Assignment or Discussion

Please feel free to respond to each other's posts as a means to begin to get to know one another.
